it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game

Class LeaderHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.LeaderHandler

  • public class LeaderHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    class used to handle the first phase of the game in which the leader cards are distributed.
    • game: the game instance
    • turnId: the integer used to calculate turn of the distribution
    • running: boolean flag to set true to start the phase
    • cardCollection: collection of the leader card used in this game

      • getList

        public java.util.List<LeaderCard> getList(Player player)
        get a list of leader cards for a player. He/She will receive a list of card based on the turn id
        Parameters:
        player -
        Returns:
        the list card of the turn

      • setList

        public void setList(Player player,
                    java.util.List<LeaderCard> list)
        sets the card collection to a specified leader card.
        Parameters:
        player - of the list card needed to get the correct sublist in the card collection
        list - of leader cards used to modify the card collection;

      • setList

        public void setList(Player player,
                    com.eclipsesource.json.JsonArray json)
        creates a new list of cards to substitute the old list of cards in memory.
        Parameters:
        player - of the list card needed to get the correct sublist in the card collection
        json - of the card names used to fill the new list and to add the card reference int he player instance
